CustomField.description: Enter the name of a flow you would like to execute. The flow name specified must have two resources called "newList" and "oldList" which are collections of sObjects to work properly.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the name of a flow you would like to execute. The flow name specified must have two resources called "newList" and "oldList" which are collections of sObjects to work properly.
CustomField.label: Flow Name
